columns.name: DataAggregationStartTime
columns.description: The start time during which the data was aggregated

columns.name: DataAggregationEndTime
columns.description: The end time during which the data was aggregated

columns.name: DataSource
columns.description: The source of the aggregated logs

columns.name: SubscriptionId
columns.description: Unique identifier assigned to the Azure subscription

columns.name: ResourceGroup
columns.description: Name of the resource group where the storage account resides

columns.name: StorageAccount
columns.description: The identifier for the storage account

columns.name: StorageContainer
columns.description: The identifier for the storage container

columns.name: StorageFileShare
columns.description: The identifier for the storage file share

columns.name: ServiceType
columns.description: Specifies the type of storage service (for example, Blob, ADLS Gen2, Files.REST, Files.SMB)

columns.name: IpAddress
columns.description: The IP addresses from which the storage was accessed

columns.name: UserAgentHeader
columns.description: Details of the user agent accessing the storage (for example, browser or application)

columns.name: OperationNamesList
columns.description: A list of storage operations performed (for example, CreateContainer, DeleteContainer)

columns.name: AuthenticationType
columns.description: The authentication method used to access the storage (for example, AccountKey, SAS, Oauth)

columns.name: AccountObjectId
columns.description: The unique identifier of the object is making the storage access

columns.name: AccountTenantId
columns.description: The unique identifier of the Azure tenant

columns.name: AccountApplicationId
columns.description: The application ID associated with the storage access

columns.name: AccountUpn
columns.description: The user principal name of the accessing user

columns.name: AccountType
columns.description: The account type used

columns.name: OperationsCount
columns.description: The total number of storage operations performed

columns.name: SuccessfulOperationsCount
columns.description: The count of successful storage operations

columns.name: FailedOperationsCount
columns.description: The count of failed storage operations

columns.name: FirstEventTimestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the first observed operation in the aggregation period

columns.name: LastEventTimestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the last observed operation in the aggregation period

columns.name: TotalResponseLength
columns.description: The total response length of all GET operations during the aggregation period

columns.name: SuccessfulReadOperations
columns.description: The count of successful read operations

columns.name: DistinctGetOperations
columns.description: The count of distinct GET operations performed

columns.name: AnonymousSuccessfulOperations
columns.description: The count of successful anonymous operations

columns.name: HasAnonymousResourceNotFoundFailures
columns.description: Indicates whether anonymous resource not found failures occurred

columns.name: CountryName
columns.description: The name of the country from where the storage was accessed

columns.name: CityName
columns.description: The name of the city from where the storage was accessed

columns.name: ProvinceName
columns.description: The name of the province or state from where the storage was accessed

columns.name: ClientSystemServiceName
columns.description: The name of the system service is in the data center

columns.name: ClientCloudPlatformName
columns.description: The name of the cloud platform where the data center is located

columns.name: IsTorExitNode
columns.description: Indicates whether the IP address is a Tor exit node

columns.name: IsKnownSuspiciousIp
columns.description: Indicates whether the IP address is known to be suspicious

columns.name: IsPrivateIp
columns.description: Indicates whether the IP address is private

columns.name: SuspiciousUserAgentName
columns.description: The name of the suspicious user agent accessing the storage

columns.name: HashReputationMd5List
columns.description: A list of MD5 hash reputations for the accessed resources

columns.name: AzureResourceId
columns.description: The Azure Resource ID of the storage account

columns.name: Location
columns.description: The location of the storage account (region)

columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: Indicate the time when the record was generated

columns.name: ReportId
columns.description: GUID to identify the record in the specific table

columns.name: ActionType
columns.description: Type of action (aggregated logs)

columns.name: AdditionalFields
columns.description: Additional information about the event in JSON array format
